article_title: When Viagra Met Botox: Pfizer, Allergan Eye Mega-Merger

			 and Allergan Inc. 
				
					
						AGN
						
					
				
			 are considering a merger that would create a drugs giant worth over $300 billio...

article_metadata.description: Pfizer and Allergan are considering a merger that would create the world's biggest pharma company and top off a frenzied year of dealmaking.
